Protein_protein_interactions.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element
Protein_protein_interactions.sparql.query: PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> SELECT DISTINCT ?targetprotein WHERE { VALUES ?sourceprotein {<http://purl.uniprot.org/uniprot/P05023>} ?sourceprotein <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/interaction> ?source . ?targetprotein <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/interaction> ?target . ?source <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/participant> ?t . ?target <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/participant> ?t . FILTER (?sourceprotein != ?targetprotein) }

binary_interactions.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

Disease_association.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element
Disease_association.sparql.query: PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> SELECT DISTINCT ?targetprotein WHERE { VALUES ?sourceprotein {<http://purl.uniprot.org/uniprot/P05023>} ?sourceprotein <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/interaction> ?source . ?targetprotein <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/interaction> ?target . ?source <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/participant> ?t . ?target <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/participant> ?t . FILTER (?sourceprotein != ?targetprotein) }
